attributes.action: Human trafficking to be introduced in schools and embedded into the curriculum
attributes.additional_details: Because it is not discussed enough in schools or within discussions between government and it is a huge ongoing issue that could affect anyone which is the worrying thing. Research shows that our young people are at risk the most which is scary because they are the future generation and we need to protect them ,especially because their minds aren’t fully developed. This means that they aren’t fully aware of the dangers/ experiences they could go through.
attributes.background: We want this topic to be debated about and discussed so it can be implemented into the education system or politicians could talk about the topic and preventions to the public to spread the message.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607151
